input: A rock has more mass then a pebble. Which object will exhibit a greater force of attraction?The greater the objects mass, the greater the force of attraction; in addition, the greater the distance between objects, the smaller the force of attraction.
When you have a lot of factories in an area the level of trash willNations that have more industry produce more hazardous waste.

A genotype with good fitness will likely produce _____ offspring than a more fit one.Genotypes with greater fitness produce more offspring and pass more copies of their alleles to the next generation.
If there are two equal-volume objects, the least dense object will be the one with _____ mass.If we have two materials with the same volume, the material with a higher mass will be more dense.
As a diver goes into shallow water, the water getsWater also gets colder as you go deeper.

If Milo is out exploring and he comes across two glaciers, each with their own u-shaped valley, will the smaller or larger glacier have a larger u-shaped valley?Smaller tributary glaciers, like tributary streams, flow into the main glacier in their own shallower U-shaped valleys.
If one trains aerobic exercises, their heart muscles will becomeAerobic exercise increases the size and strength of muscles in the heart and helps all your muscles develop greater endurance.

Jan had a very low heart rate, but was perfectly healthy, indicating that her heart expels blood in amounts that areWhen the heart expels more blood with each stroke, the heart has to beat less often in order to maintain the same volume of blood flow.
Bob's blood glucose levels have increased, which means he should also be producing _____ insulin.As blood glucose levels decrease, less insulin is produced.

Dan is watching the ship approach the dock. While the ship is near him, it is massive. However, as the ship comes closer, it begins to lookIf you are standing on the shore and a ship is going out to sea, the ship gets smaller as it moves further away from you.
As two objects move closer together, the force of gravity between themObjects that are closer together have a stronger force of gravity between them.
When we look at monkeys and humans they have a lot of matching DNA meaning they are.The more similar the DNA molecules of different species are, the closer the relationship is likely to be.

Greta has 15 resistors in series on her circuit, while Evan has 2 similar resistors in series on his circuit. Whose circuit has the greatest resistance?Increasing the number of resistors in a series circuit increases the overall resistance of the circuit.
Ollie is a rocket scientist and was testing missiles. Better missiles likely result in _____ rockets.The development of better missiles fostered better rocket technologies.

If Mona is building a new electrical system and she installs thinner wires then were previously there, what can she expect to happen to the resistance of the system?Thicker wires offer less resistance.
Tony wanted to prevent cramps by not warming up. This _____ blood flow to his muscles.Warming up exercises increases the blood flow to the muscles and increases the heart rate.
